entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
